item.description:
Come meet your fellow beer lovers and be the first to try Mayflower's new Cooper's Series Single Hop Ale with Styrian Aurora hops, along with 4 other Mayflower brews this Thursday at 7:00pm at Tommy Doyle's Kendall Square. Christina from Mayflower will be hosting the event, and I'd love to see some new and familiar faces from the Craft Beer Crew! Don't forget to RSVP here: http://singlehop.eventbrite.com/

 

This one-batch beer is Mayflower's first ever single-hopped beer, using tons of Styrian Aurora hops from Slovenia. (I bet you've never tried those before!) These hops are spicy and extremely aromatic without being overwhelmingly bitter. They just finished brewing it last week!

 

Alongside the single-batch 6.9% ABV Single Hop Ale and 4 other Mayflowers like the super citrusy Spring Hop Ale, the 77 IBU IPA, and the extremely highly-rated Porter, will be free appetizers and Mayflower gear & glassware! Plus, you get to hang out with the Mayflower crew, and they're always a good time.

 

Heads up, the easiest way to find Tommy Doyle's in Kendall is to head to 20 Hampshire Street in Kendall Square, Cambridge. I also suggest wearing something red to help fellow meetup-ers find each other, and I'll reserve and area for our group. Don't forget to RSVP! http://singlehop.eventbrite.com/

 

Rich
item.how_to_find_us: Wear some red! Call or text Rich at 909-276-7424 if you can't find the group.
item.name: New Single Batch Mayflower Beer Launch Party with Free Appetizers
